item.description:
The Sensi-Wrap is a lightweight compression bandage which sticks to itself, but not to skin or other materials.

item.title: Elastic Bandage Wrap Hook Closures
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
BandAce Secure Fastener Clips Accessories for BandAce Elastic Bandage Wraps are essential for providing a properly secured bandage wrap. Have you ever found yourself unwrapping an injury at the end of the day, only to find the fasteners had fallen off over the day? If so, you know it's important to have plenty of fasteners on hand, especially if you're an athlete! Our metal and elastic Stretch Clips feature hook fasteners designed to stay put keep bandages firmly in place!

The post Elastic Bandage Wrap Hook Closures appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
We offer 25, 50 and 100 count BandAce fastener clips packs, so they’ll never go missing at the worst times. Use in combination with the AT Surgical BandAce elastic bandage wrap for optimal stability and joint protection.

The post Elastic Bandage Wrap Hook Closures appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Hand Exerciser Ball for Joint Decongestion, RSI, Arthritis & More
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
• Increases flexibility, reduces stress, eases muscle tension, relieves joint pain, prevents stiffness, develops grip, and strengthens the fingers, hands and forearms
  • Made of a mineral gel enriched by Rose Hip Oil to allow moisturizing and hydration of the skin during use
  • Durable, Washable and Reusable

The post Gel Hand Exerciser Ball for Joint Decongestion, RSI, Arthritis & More appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The Fresco HandGym Pure Gel Hand Exerciser Stress Ball has been created to optimize the entire rehabilitation process and is often used for the development and improvement of propioception, hand and forearm muscle strengthening, mobility and “light touch” improvement, rheumatoid joint decongestion, repetitive stress injury (RSI) treatment, arthritis, and fine tuning dexterity, coordination and motor control in the fingers, hands and arms.

The HandGym will have a long life if cared for properly. If it gets dirty, wash with warm soapy water, rinse and dry carefully with a cloth towel, and dust with Talcum powder.

Exercises

The post Gel Hand Exerciser Ball for Joint Decongestion, RSI, Arthritis & More appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Terry Cloth Antimicrobial Soft Comfort Cotton Baby Bath Wash Mitts
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Super soft to keep baby squeaky clean.These extra soft wash mitts are amazingly absorbent, incredibly fluffy and offer exceptional comfort. organic cotton terry wash mitt…

The post Terry Cloth Antimicrobial Soft Comfort Cotton Baby Bath Wash Mitts appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Super soft to keep baby squeaky clean.These extra soft wash mitts are amazingly absorbent, incredibly fluffy and offer exceptional comfort. organic cotton terry wash mitt is the perfect addition to any bathtime routine. Specifically designed for righties or lefties and moms, dads and caregivers alike. Our soft, light weight, durable, and affordable wash mitt has practical features too including a grosgrain ribbon loop for easy hang drying.Ribbon loop for hang dry
Made of best terry cloth One generous size fits all. Not just for babies! Great for gentle face exfoliation and sensitive skin alike.These extra soft wash mitts are amazingly absorbent, incredibly fluffy and offer exceptional comfort.

Features:

  • Incredibly soft and absorbent wash mitt is perfect for every skin type including, sensitive and delicate baby skin
  • Lightweight and durable fabric dries quickly gently wash your babies or small children as face and hand towels for your family and guests
  • wash your entire body in the shower or bath
  • Ribbon loop for hang dry
  • Made of best terry cloth
  • Feel soft and durable in use
  • Stable in quality, 5 star quality grantee
  • Piece Dyed
  • Can wash for more than 100 times
  • Environment-friendly

Specification:

  • Reusable
  • Material : 100% cotton,16S/1, 21S/2, 32S/2,single/double loop
  • Lightweight and durable
  • Feature: Soft comfort

    • Sizes

  • Sizes Available
  • 6” X 10”

    • The post Terry Cloth Antimicrobial Soft Comfort Cotton Baby Bath Wash Mitts appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Terry Bibs
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Our Terry Cloth Bibs are made from cotton on one side and a waterproof synthetic material on the inseam, making them comfortable and waterproof. Velcro closures make removal a breeze.

The post Terry Bibs appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Terry Bibs appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Reusable Incontinence Underpads
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Save significantly on incontinence care costs. Our reusable underpads draw moisture away from the body and prevent skin irritation. For adults seeking solutions to frequent incontinence problems due to weak or overactive bladders, stop stressful sleepless nights fighting your overactive bladder urges. Sleep better knowing you won't have to get up several times through-out the night to change the sheets. Multiple layers prevent wetness from spreading to the bed - the soft, 3-ply, quilted fabric works much like an egg crate and add a soft layer to firm mattresses.

The post Reusable Incontinence Underpads appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
AT Surgical’s enviornmentally friendly Reusable Underpad is made for durability with a special 3-ply fabric construction:

  • The top outer layer is created with soft wick material for whisking away moisture and assures maximum comfort.
  • The 2nd layer is a heavy-duty soaker with the ability to double it’s weight in absorbency. It’s crafted from a heavy-duty felt material specifically designed for absorbing body fluids.
  • The bottom layer is made from a special Fablon barrier we call Unishield – it is 100% waterproof and will never crack even after 200 washings.

Simply lay one of AT Surgical’s Reusable Underpad Waterproof Mattress Liners on top of the sheets and remove when necessary. It’s also a great alternative to frequent laundry loads and is less wasteful than disposable incontinence products. You can even layer up the Reusable Underpad for additional protection. No matter what stage of life you’re in, our Reusable Underpad mattress protector offers the relief and peace of mind you need.

The post Reusable Incontinence Underpads appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Velcro Incontinence Pants
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
These vinyl waterproof underpants are shell-lined with cotton on the interior that slips over incontinence briefs, liners and pads or adult diapers. Great for those seeking solutions to manage incontinence.

  • The elastic waistband, adjustable Velcro® closure means these are a snap to pull on.
  • Elastic bands are covered with soft cotton to prevent irritation to sensitive skin.
  • Generous fit makes these especially comfortable.
  • Comes in White or Blue fabric.
  • Durable, washable and reusable.
  • Hang or lay flat - avoid heat exposure. Do not machine dry or iron.

The post Velcro Incontinence Pants appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Velcro Incontinence Pants appeared first on AT Surgical.
